Work Experience Highlights

Microstructure Modeling with Deep Learning

05/2023 - 04/2024

Employer Location: University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign, IL, US (Remote, Python, Slurm, nn-UNet, Cellpose, Research Volunteering)

  • Enabled multi-class segmentation and quantitative analysis of diverse cell types, later applied across 120,000 brightfield mouse brain samples, supporting comprehensive brain cellular mapping
  • Adapted training over UIUC Biocluster and Google Colab GPUs
  • Implemented data cleaning, enhancement, post-processing, and ensemble training strategies to significantly improve the segmentation precision and recall over 90%
  • Created visualization UI and statistical reports

β-amyloid Detection in Light Sheet Scan

06/2024 - Present

Western University, ON, CA (In-Person, Python, Dask, Coiled, AI, Napari, Syglass, GCP, Co-op)

  • Facilitated the precise localization and quantification of β-amyloid deposits in whole mouse brains, advancing neurodegenerative disease research
  • Improved accuracy of preprocessing step of quantification pipeline with nn-UNet and CellSeg3D
  • Contributed to Dask open source software stacks
  • Fixed bug to reduce the processing of hundreds of GB's of lightsheet scans
  • Developed multiscale images visualization tools using Napari
  • Annotated scans with VR-based and open-source annotation apps

Other Programming Projects

QRCode-Quest

01/2022 - 04/2022 (Java, Android Studio, Course Project)

  • Developed testable and maintainable app, from planning to presentation
  • Implemented unit testing using JUnit, Espresso and Mockito
  • Built database for user profile and photos storage and retrieval

Implementing Gazprea Compiler

10/2022 - 12/2022 (C/C++, LLVM, ANTLR, Course Project)

  • Practiced software ownership, team communication, problem solving
  • Developed a C++ LLVM backend with C bindings for a compiler that supports linear algebra data types with automatic type inference
  • Delivered advanced features in timely fashion while minimizing bugs and memory leaks using automated tests

Real-Time ORB-SLAM on Lab Robot

04/2023 (C/C++, Python, Linux, Docker, Independent Course Project)

  • Solved compilation and IPC issues, deploying ORB-SLAM3 on lab robot
  • Evaluated the algorithm against another localization method
  • Achieved real-time processing rate by moving computation on remote laptop
